title: UVALDE UPDATE: We Now Know HOW BAD Police Botched It
description: Republicans sold us out and helped to pass bipartisan gun control, and it's worse than we possibly imagined. Also, just when you thought the Uvalde story couldn't get any worse, it has. And the gays have turned the Navy into a floating joke.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
